title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and 
Superannuation Act 2024 (Sections 27, 28, 29, 30 and 31) (Commencement) 
Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited court civil law criminal law superannuation act 2024 (sections 27 28 29 30 31) (commencement) order 2024

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation.
heading: 2. The 8th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections 28
text_raw:
2. The 8th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections 28 
and 29 of the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law and Superannuation 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation.
text_norm: 2 8th day august 2024 appointed day section 28 29 court civil law criminal law superannuation (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (no 30 2024) shall come operation

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 30 of 2024) shall come into operation.
heading: 3. The 19th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
3. The 19th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections 
27, 30 (other than paragraph (b)) and 31 of the Courts, Civil Law, Criminal Law 
and Superannuation (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 August, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [400] 3
